info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:09PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Pondera, southeastern Glacier and northwestern Teton Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 309 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Heart Butte to 20 miles southeast of East Glacier Park Village. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heart Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
